member.name: T:SearchPlugin.SearchControllerSettings
member.summary: Settings that determine how the Search.Plugin module is configured and used.

member.name: P:SearchPlugin.SearchControllerSettings.CaptchaShowFailCount
member.summary: Maximum number of attempts to search before the user is prevented from logging in for several minutes.

member.name: P:SearchPlugin.SearchControllerSettings.CaptchaWordLength
member.summary:
Length of the Captcha word.
Default: 7 Minimum: 6 Maximum: 12

member.name: P:SearchPlugin.SearchControllerSettings.CacheUseSession
member.summary:
Determines whether the ip address or unique Net Core session id is used to cache data.
This is mainly useful in a debug environment and should be set to true.

member.name: P:SearchPlugin.SearchControllerSettings.ShowRememberMe
member.summary: Determines whether the Remember Me option is shown or not.

member.name: P:SearchPlugin.SearchControllerSettings.RememberMeCookieName
member.summary:
Remember me cookie name.
Must be between 6 and 20 characters long.
Default: RememberMe

member.name: P:SearchPlugin.SearchControllerSettings.EncryptionKey
member.summary:
Encryption key used to encrypt cookie values.
Must be between 20 and 60 characters long.

member.name: P:SearchPlugin.SearchControllerSettings.ChangePasswordUrl
member.summary:
Url that the user can be redirected to, in order to change their password.
This must be either a relative or absolute Uri.

member.name: P:SearchPlugin.SearchControllerSettings.AuthenticationScheme
member.summary: The name of the authentication scheme

member.name: P:SearchPlugin.SearchControllerSettings.MinimumKeywordSearchLength
member.summary: Minimum length of keyword search string

member.name: P:SearchPlugin.SearchControllerSettings.HighlightQuickSearchTerms
member.summary: Indicates that the keyword search result should have the search keyword highlighted in html

member.name: P:SearchPlugin.SearchControllerSettings.ItemsPerPage
member.summary: Total number of search results per page

member.name: T:SearchPlugin.Classes.Search.DefaultSearchProvider
member.summary: Default search provider to be used if no other search provider is registered

member.name: M:SearchPlugin.Classes.Search.DefaultSearchProvider.#ctor(PluginManager.Abstractions.IPluginClassesService)
member.summary: Constructor

member.name: M:SearchPlugin.Classes.Search.DefaultSearchProvider.KeywordSearch(Middleware.Search.KeywordSearchOptions@)
member.summary: Performs a keyword search

member.name: M:SearchPlugin.Classes.Search.DefaultSearchProvider.SearchResponseTypes(System.Boolean@)
member.summary: Retrieves all available search response types from all registered search providers
member.param: Indicates whether its the providers from a quick search or normal search.

member.name: M:SearchPlugin.Classes.Search.DefaultSearchProvider.AdvancedSearch
member.summary: Retrieves a list of strings from all search providers that can optionally be used by the UI to provide a paged or tabbed advance search option.

member.name: M:SearchPlugin.Classes.Search.DefaultSearchProvider.GetSearchResults(System.String@)
member.summary: Retrieve existing search results if they exist.

member.summary: Search controller, allows users to search using a standard interface implemented by ISearchProvider interface.

member.summary: Keywords to be searched

member.summary: Unique search id used to verify the call

member.summary: Quick search view model, designed for quickly searching all registered areas

member.summary: Text to be searched for

member.summary: Id of the current search, this will be used when verifying that the call is legit

member.summary: Text to be searched for

member.summary: Id of the current search, this will be used when verifying that the call is legit

member.summary: Available search names for display on search page

member.summary: Retrieves the url for the active search name if it exists.

member.summary: Retrieves the name of the controller for the active search option, if it exists.
